mapper.insert: insert into t_stock_date (id, stock_date, is_trade_date, is_start_week_day, is_end_week_day) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isStartWeekDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEndWeekDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_stock_date
id,
stock_date,
is_trade_date,
is_start_week_day,
is_end_week_day,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stockDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isTradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_stock_date
stock_date = #{stockDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_trade_date = #{isTradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_start_week_day = #{isStartWeekDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_end_week_day = #{isEndWeekDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_stock_date where is_end_week_day = '00' and is_trade_date='00' and stock_date <= #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by stock_date desc limit 1
select GROUP_CONCAT(t.stock_date) from t_stock_date t where t.is_end_week_day='00' and t.stock_date <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.stock_date >= #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
